title: dependents not removed when copying a spec with specific deptype

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

This occurs in #22115 

```console
$ spack graph --deptype=link openssh
ncurses@6.2%gcc@10.2.0~symlinks+termlib arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2
==> Error: 'readline'
```

The dep structure is this:

```console
[    ]  openssh@8.5p1%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2
[bl  ]      ^libedit@3.1-20210216%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2
[bl  ]          ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@10.2.0~symlinks+termlib arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2
[b   ]              ^pkgconf@1.7.3%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2
[bl  ]      ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@10.2.0~symlinks+termlib arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2
[b   ]          ^pkgconf@1.7.3%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2
[bl  ]      ^openssl@1.1.1j%gcc@10.2.0~docs+systemcerts arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2
[b   ]          ^perl@5.32.1%gcc@10.2.0+cpanm+shared+threads arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2
[bl  ]              ^berkeley-db@18.1.40%gcc@10.2.0~docs patches=b231fcc4d5cff05e5c3a4814f6a5af0e9a966428dc2176540d2c05aff41de522 arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2
[bl  ]              ^gdbm@1.19%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2
[bl  ]                  ^readline@8.0%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2
[bl  ]                      ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@10.2.0~symlinks+termlib arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2
[b   ]                          ^pkgconf@1.7.3%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2
[bl  ]          ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@10.2.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2
[bl  ]      ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@10.2.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2
```

So `ncurses` has 3 parents (libedit, openssh, readline), but only libedit and openssh are part of the link deps and readline is not.

If you now make a copy of a concretized `openssh` with just link deps, it does not remove parent edges to non-link type deps:

```python
>>> x = spack.spec.Spec('openssh')
>>> x.concretize()
>>> y = x.copy(deps=('link',))
>>> next((spec for spec in y['ncurses'].dependents() if spack.spec.Spec('readline') in spec))
readline@8.0%gcc@10.2.0 arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2 ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@10.2.0~symlinks+termlib arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2
```
